name: W.U.R.M.
description:
Hello comrade!

This is W.U.R.M. - why u rant me.

The first game ever created by MoleWare (During one week). It is a simple Remake of the old C64 Nibly., but with Colorchange!

Eat the Food before the Time is over without eating yourself!

Controls:

  • W for going up
  • A for going left
  • S for going down
  • D for going right
  • Spacebar for swapping wormcolor to match the Food.
  • Escape to Exit.

 Note:

  • Corners are taken automatic!
  • Time is running faster when stopping for to long or not getting food.
  • Game gets faster every Lvl.
